About Rhize

Rhize is a data hub that collects, stores, integrates, and processes data from a manufacturing system.

My role

I was a Graduate Software Engineer at Rhize from April 2023 to May 2024.

My tasks

  • Delivered an MVP comprising 8 APIs and associated workflows that collect and process data from watch assembly operations
  • Transformed data with JSONata to comply with the ISA-95 model and allow for ultimate observability and traceability of various manufacturing processes
  • Developed new features and tests on the back-end using Golang and GraphQL
  • Developed integration tests with Node and Cypress for a React-GraphQL app
  • Implemented GraphQL operations for a Dgraph database using Apollo Client
  • Automated E2E tests by configuring a CI/CD pipeline in GitLab to run tests in parallel and send the results to Cypress Cloud for advanced analytics
  • Built a service that published messages to an MQTT server with Node.js and Express.js
  • Gained exposure to authentication with Keycloak and developing components with Storybook
  • Composed multi-service containers with Docker for testing and debugging
  • Analysed logs and traces with Grafana
